channel.title: orkut on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in orkut on Praveen Lobo

item.title: A 21 Year Old Friendship
item.description: Krishnamurthy. He is my oldest friend. We were in same class in Bangalore for six years starting 1990 before I had to leave. We were not in touch and had not met more than a handful of times in the last fifteen years. Then when I met him, he was still the same! He had moved to a new place and before I knew it, he was gone from there. I tried to find him but in vain.
